body_content.explanation: a way of thinking and acting based on facts and what is possible, rather than on hopes for things that are unlikely to happen:
examples: His decision not to expand the business shows his down-to-earth realism.

body_content.explanation: in science and philosophy, the belief that objects continue to exist in the world even when no one is there to see them
paintings, films, books, etc. that try to represent life as it really is:
examples: The director used handheld camera techniques to add to the gritty realism of the film.
